name: Ogre’s Mask
effect: Choose a Pokémon ex in your discard pile that has “Ogerpon” in its name, and switch it with 1 of your Pokémon ex in play that has “Ogerpon” in its name. Any attached cards, damage counters, Special Conditions, turns in play, and any other effects remain on the new Pokémon.
author: 5ban Graphics
